td.content: s:pt reports severe rib tenderness, severe low back pain, Body Aches. Also complains of severe numbness and tingling sensation in foot from time to time. pt is a 74 year old white m retired. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 60.8 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 84, SystolicBP 111, DiastolicBP 70, Respiration 16, CBC WBC=20000 /mm3,Hgb=8 mg/dL,Hct=30 %, Basic Metabolic Panel creatinine=4 mg/dL,BUN=80 mg/dL,Ca=12 mg/dL, serum protein electrophoresis shows monoclonal M spike, patient appears in severe distress due to pain a:Low Back Pain p:administered CELESTONE - 3 MG/ML IM once in 4 month, performed CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, serum protein electrophoresis, and performed E/M Emergency Services Level 3 - Completed.

Term.SYMPTOM: At risk for impaired home maintenance management

td.content: s:pt presents with severe low back pain, severe rib tenderness. he has history of severe numbness and tingling sensation in foot. pt is a 75 year old white m retired. he states he has never smoked a cigarette in his life he drinks 2 beers per night o:Height 192 cm, Weight 62.1 kg, Temperature 37.2 C, Pulse 76, SystolicBP 115, DiastolicBP 76, Respiration 17, patient appears in severe distress due to pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 2 (new patient) - Completed, and referred patient to rheumatology.

s:a 75 yo white male presents with severe numbness and tingling sensation in foot, severe rib tenderness, Body Aches. he has history of severe low back pain. o:Height 191 cm, Weight 61.2 kg, Temperature 37.1 C, Pulse 75, SystolicBP 112, DiastolicBP 72, Respiration 16, patient appears in severe distress due to pain a:Low Back Pain p:performed E/M Level 3 (new patient) - Completed, and ordered CBC, Basic Metabolic Panel, serum protein electrophoresis.
